page.title: 12LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Thursday during the winter in the village hall.They play cards and dominoes and somtimes have people in to talk to them.Whist drives are run by the village hall committee every Saturday night lots of chidren go too. During the winter evening classes such as dressmaking are held in the school.The golf course at Minto is used by men and woman from all over this area.Denholm Dean is situated about half a mile from the Village and on the estate of cavers.The Dean used to be a farvourite haunt of John Leydon and it was here that he composed of infancy.The Dean house is gone now.In the days gone by there was a tea house at the Dean,The Dean was like a large garden,with sun seats Plants and flowers.
